docs.title: Overview
docs.text: This site is a collection of resources that can be used in the whole Project Managmenet lifecycle. The content is broken down into the five process groups: Initiating, Planning, Executing, Monitoring & Controlling, and Closing.

docs.title: Initiating
docs.text:
Below you find templates related to the initation of a project.

  • Project Charter
    • What is a project charter?
    • The charter: selling your project
    • Project Charter Template
    • Project Chater Template 2
  • Stakeholder Register
    • Stakeholder management
    • Stakeholder and Resource Register
  • RACI Matrix
    • RACI for beginners - VIDEO
    • Template
